name: Snake Game (lketerson)
description:
Project made in order to show how the snake's movement is performed in the game. When the second piece of the body is added, it appears in red, and so it is possible to follow it during the movement, noting that it is only repositioned when it reaches the end of the body, it is placed in the last position of the head.

HOW TO PLAY:
Move: 
WASD / Arrow Keys
Every 30 seconds the speed increases.
For each point collected, the size increases by +1.


You can download the source code from my github:
https://github.com/lketerson/SnakeGame
